mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(uid, uPassword, uName, uNickName, uPhone, uEmail, uGender, uBirthday, uInsertDate) VALUES(#{uid}, #{uPassword}, #{uName}, #{uNickName}, #{uPhone}, #{uEmail}, #{uGender}, #{uBirthday}, now())
